title: Implement ::selection according to Pseudo Elements Level 4
body: ::selection has now been re-added to the spec: https://drafts.csswg.org/css-pseudo-4/#selectordef-selection

comments.body: I now understand that most of the "bugs" described here comes from the property not being inherited, and there's no way to turn inheritance on using the inherit keyword. If you turn on inheritance on ::selection (and allow unset/initial/inherit as values for user control), the bugs described here would vanish.
I filed a bug two months ago, too, requesting to fix those bugs, but didn't recieve any feedback, comments or attention: https://connect.microsoft.com/IE/Feedback/Details/1581954
